entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
